programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep25
programme.desc: A Night To Remember - Jim must convince Strickler to cut the bond to his mom while Claire and Toby sneak into his office during the Spring Fling Dance for the incantation.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Something Rotten This Way Comes - Jim is dealt an emotional blow in his final fight with Angor Rot and must decide if his team is finally ready to cross over into the Darklands.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Becoming Part 1 - An average high school student, Jim Lake, yearns for adventure and he gets more than he bargained for when he inherits the mantle of Trollhunter after the previous Trollhunter is killed

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Shock and Awww - Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S3 Ep62
programme.desc: Heart of the Lion - When the Paladins learn about Sendak's six bases across the world, they plan an investigative mission to gain more intel

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Puppets Take Meanhattan , Zen & the Art of Video Game Patience - Lucretia learns that her puppeteer idol isn't a very nice person. Audrey battles her big sister for the best score on an old arcade game.

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged S3 Ep62
programme.desc: Clifthanger - Skya and Ace accompany a Pteracopter outside the crater to help uncover a cache of ore only to discover something unexpected

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Two - After Bullwinkle drinks a monster serum, he can't control when he turns into a big hairy monster, so he and Rocky go on the run from angry mobs and internet celebrities

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Why Do Bees Make Honey? - Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess S1 Ep14
programme.desc: When Will The Owl Go Hooooo!? - Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Creature Catcher , Slugby - Revenge of the Creature Catcher Casper, Mantha and Ra accidentally lead Jimmy's father to the underworld.Slugby. To prove that the teachers haven't gone soft, Alder and Dash stage a Slugby match.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School S1 Ep24
programme.desc: You Oughta Be In Pictures , Crypt Critters - You Oughta Be in Pictures When Mantha sees a Deedstown mob attacking a group of fellow zombies, she's determined to lead them in a counterattack. Crypt Critters Mantha comes down with an embarrassing case of crypt critters, but refuses to go to the nurse.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Le Grand Derriere , I'm Your Boovest Fan - Lucy changes after becoming the first human-chef at a fancy Boov restaurant, Oh is an obsessed superfan of a tee-ball team and uses Boov-tech to cheat.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Scared Crazy , Superslushious - Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone, Oh upgrades Slushious to Superslushious things get out of hand.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Fandom Menace , Moby Dot - Lotta enters a contest to win an empanada date that turns out to be a scam. / Dot desperately pursues a rare albino hornet terrorizing the park.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: The Cheer Hunter , Dot's Entertainment - Zoe invites Lotta to join her cheer squad and Audrey gets jealous / Dot becomes obsessed with making people laugh after telling her first joke

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff , Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn't go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip , Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero , Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he's a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn't go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis' backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko , What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian's lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus , The Baby-Glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House , To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs , I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S2 Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep71
programme.desc: Mi Amore Wing - Following the announcement of Dagur and Malas engagement Astrid questions her relationship with Hiccup. In the meantime the Riders battle Krogan over an unexpectedly placed lens

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep72
programme.desc: Ruff Transition - A baby Razorwhip bonds with Ruffnut forcing her to become a Wingmaiden but when she doesnt have the maternal instincts she must figure out how to protect the baby dragon when the Flyers attack

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel - When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! Hotel guests Gabby and Pandy check in with the Hotel Manager DJ Catnip then go to Mercat's Spa and even order room service from Pillow Cat! For our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Pillow Cat sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A Knight's Tail - Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. But it turns out that someone's locked King Catnip in the tower and without him they'll have to cancel the Royal Knighting Ceremony! It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Abysmal Altercation of the Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Bout of the Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep63
programme.desc: The Neighs Have It - The PALs run into their old rivals the BUDs on the first day of classes, prompting Lucky to run for class rep. Elsewhere, Abigail helps solve a mystery.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep64
programme.desc: A Rider's Balance - After meeting her riding idols, Pru vows to practice until she's perfect even if it means missing out on a bonfire her best friends are planning.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy S3 Ep65
programme.desc: Welcome Back Otter - Abigail puts herself at risk to reunite an orphaned otter with his family. But the school veterinarian insists the animal will be safer at the zoo.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer , Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear, Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.desc: Becoming Part 2 - Jim warms up to the idea of being the Trollhunter until he faces Bular, who is determined to destroy him, so he seeks help in Blinky and AAARRRGGHH!!

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wherefore Art Thou Trollhunter? - Jim is not welcomed by the Trolls as their new Trollhunter, and he suffers a humiliating defeat at the hands of Draal

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Gnome Your Enemy - Jim undertakes his first Trollhunting mission by starting small: he must shrink down to eight inches tall to apprehend a mischievous gnome.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they're so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heather's parents.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S3 Ep63
programme.desc: Trial by Fire - The Paladins struggle to escape after Sendak captures them, their lions, and Admiral Sanda

programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Vandal! / Tumbles, Where Did You Go? - Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: I'm Not A Barbababy Anymore / Roboxman - No! It's over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Boots / Moon Parrot / Tailball - Tim tries out some new rocket boots which soon fly out of control. Tim, Tommy and Tia bird-sit the Bronte's MoonParrot. Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije - Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Rainforest Race / Bok Bok Birthday - Dora and Boots race their boxcar against Croc Racers in the Rainforest Race. / Dora and Boots secretly hand out Big Red Chicken's birthday invites to all their friends in time for his birthday party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George have to find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water.

programme.title: Sharkdog S3 Ep317

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep402

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep307

programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep223

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep122

programme.desc: The Throne Thief - Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep79
programme.desc: Yellow - It's a special day for yellow Laa-Laa. Big yellow flowers grow in Teletubbyland and a yellow balloon leads Laa-Laa to Tiddlytubby Umby Pumby.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep19
programme.desc: S - Dee encourages a friend to say 's', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We play on a seesaw, eat some sausages and meet a singing seal!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Muscly Messy - At the OKIDO Oki-lympics, everyone is joining in! A race between Messy with his super muscles and Zam with his amazing new robot pants results in some surprises.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Pigs Might Fly - Mojo and Bo are great at picking apples with Mojo's crane top. But Preston's drone might be even better... until it accidentally scoops up Felix. Mojo and Bo are on the chase!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep14
programme.desc: The Shopping Badge - Duggee loves to shop local, so the Big Shop is a Big Deal for him. He's over-excited and wants two of everything. The Squirrels have to remind him 'we only popped in for milk!'

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep13
programme.desc: The Good Choices - The Squirrels haven't been making good choices round the messy clubhouse. With Duggee's help, they start to get it right. But not before sending Roly's imagination into overdrive!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cool, Man - At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Hey Quacky! - Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Beach - As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear Cubs - In this episode Andy, Jen & Scout head to Alaska, in America, on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of fish being buried underground. Along the way, Andy meets a grizzly bear cub setting out on its first fishing trip with its mother to catch salmon.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Mission: Pop Pop - Newfoundland Sylvie is a big therapy dog who loves to help people when they are worried with big soft cuddles. Sylvie and Katrina help a young boy named Alfie visit his great-grandfather.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Wildebeest and Monarch Butterfly - Steve and Aneeshwar meet some wildebeest hanging out in a big group. The second animal they see, a monarch butterfly, has an astonishing wild connection with the wildebeest.

programme.title: Playtime Towers S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Socks - It's laundry day in Playtime Towers, and Bella and Lift have washed everyone's socks. All they need to do now is find the matching pairs!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep43
programme.desc: The Soap Opera Badge - The Squirrels accidentally break the Chickens' TV aerial!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep42
programme.desc: The Mythical Creature Badge - The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep41
programme.desc: The Puzzle Badge - The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Chichen Itza, Mexico - Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo in Chichen Itza, Mexico, so the Go Jetters attempt to save it.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Lambert-Fisher Glacier, Antartica - When Grandmaster Glitch builds his effigy in ice, his digging threatens the Lambert Glacier in Antarctica.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep15
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca - Coming Through! - Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but go about it differently, and when Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Wool on Wheels - Scarf Lady is holding a 'knitted treats' sale in the park, but the weather is causing a problem...

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Star Renovation - Venus has attempted to redecorate the night sky, but now Sarah can't find any of her favourite constellations...

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Holiday - Seamus has booked the wrong date for his and Little Woo's holiday. Stanley repurposes the locations of the town into activities and sights to give them a holiday in a day.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Dig - Stanley helps Fifi and Fred dig up some shiny stones in their garden that turn out to be old bits of mosaic. With the help of Cynthia and Hettie, they put the pieces back together.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep21
programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Lake Retba, Senegal - The team gets all shook up when Glitch sucks up the pink water of Senegal's Milkshake Lake.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Tomato - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, Tomato changes colour.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Raspberry - Raspberry sings a song, saying it's cool to be kind.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep41

programme.title: Singapore Hour S1 Ep28

programme.title: Headline News 2025/2026
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: Wombless S1 Ep1
programme.desc: An Unnecessary Sacrifice? - In Maharashtra's Beed region, female cane cutters sacrifice their wombs to keep earning for their families. But these women are now fighting for a different future, determined to break the cycle and give their daughters a life beyond the sugarcane fields.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Wombless S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Fight for Change - For over a decade, activists and government officials have been fighting back against the practice of unnecessary hysterectomies in India. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
